channel.title: Crypto on Segflow
channel.description: Recent content in Crypto on Segflow

item.title: 3DS CTF: Xesar (crypto)
item.description: Recently i decided to start playing CTFs again, and since i needed some training before playing a real one, I decided to take a look at some recent CTF in CTFtime.org. And then i found this crypto task with no solution for it yet, and that’s why I jumped into it :) The task was the following: We found a paperback with some notes. Help us to find what is this.
